about_the_game:
ENTER INTO THE ULTIMATE POLITICAL ARENA!


In a time where politics feel more like a battleground than a debate, Political Punchers transforms the intensity of the political sphere into an exciting 3D fighting game that’s both hilarious and thrilling. As the next presidential election looms on the horizon, it’s time to elect your fighter!

ARCADE VERSUS MODE:

Challenge your friends (or foes) in intense player-versus-player or player-vs-computer match-ups. Cross-platform online play is currently available for open BETA. Whether it’s a friendly duel or a heated rivalry, Political Punchers delivers thrilling, competitive 3d fighting game action. Prove your political power and dominate the arena!

11 PLAYABLE POLITICIAN FIGHTERS:

Choose from a roster of 8 unique characters (plus 3 unlockable characters), inspired by the political landscape of the USA. Each fighter brings their own unique style and special moves to the battle. Who will you lead to victory?

11 PROGRESSIVE STORY LINES:

Embark on 11 different campaigns of political ambition. Navigate your fighter through a series of battles, each a steppingstone on the path to victory. Each character has a unique experience in this hilarious parody on American politics.

10 BATTLE ARENAS:

Engage in combat across 10 distinct 3D stages, each offering a humorous take on the world of politics. Ranging from the revered corridors of the Oval Office to the fortified grounds of a Middle Eastern Military Complex, these arenas provide the ultimate setting for monumental showdowns.

FREE UPDATES & PLANNED ADDITIONAL CONTENT:

The developer is hard at work adding more unlockable Arenas and Characters, as well as improving the overall game-play experience including mechanics and character balancing. Cross-platform multiplayer arena with rollback synchronization is currently in BETA stage development. Check back for frequent updates.

Download Political Punchers today and become the next Commander in Chief:

As the political landscape heats up, Political Punchers offers a chance to let off some steam and have a blast with friends. Whether you’re in it for the laughs, the competition, or the chance to play out your political fantasies, this game is a complete knockout.

Don’t just watch the election - become part of the action.

short_description: Choose from 11 politician fighters and duke it out across 10 unique stages. Featuring multiplayer match-ups and 11 hilarious single player stories. As the 2024 presidential election approaches, Political Punchers offers a humorous way to make light of the political chaos.
